title: pvp.net kernel error
body: I used to have this error every patch, i thought it had gone away on its own. is anyone else having this error when trying to start the patcher?

replies.body: The kernel error is usually caused by a change in security settings that's no longer allowing the patcher to launch.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and get back in game.  Let me know if you have any questions.
